attributes.action: NOT introduce a mandatory system of licensing for residential landlords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mandatory licensing would:
1. Undermine the private property rights of a citizen to do what they choose with their property including letting it to a willing tenant.
2. Not drive up standards in the residential letting sector as suggested.
3. Would duplicate existing methods of control and therefore is unnecessary.
4. Restrict the supply of rental accommodation.
5. Be a tax on the rental sector.
6. Be costly to implement and an added financial burden to the citizen.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to NOT introduce a mandatory system of licensing for residential landlords.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=landlord-licence
